category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA115_filename_editing_mode
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to restrict or inhibit the editing of the file name in environments where by default files do not get renamed or where the file name is automatically assigned on the basis of other data (i.e. item ID or multifield key). File name editing can take place only during first save and save as new item operations. Possible values: 0 - do not allow file name editing 1 - allow file name editing (Default) 2 - allow file name editing only when the item type belongs to the list specified in the preference TCAA115_filename_editing_allowed_for_item_types
